channel.title: A Place For External BVS Sites?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "A Place For External BVS Sites?"

item.title: Re: A Place For External BVS Sites?
item.content:encoded: Umm wow? lol others live in Georgia also? LOL OMFG……..im in V town just saying. (I know this is off topic lol but im just wondering how many live in georgia that play BVS lol)

item.title: Re: A Place For External BVS Sites?
item.content:encoded: See Other Resources. Now on the side bar.

item.title: Re: A Place For External BVS Sites?
item.content:encoded: There, I've added BVS News to the site and a couple of creator secrets. :)

item.title: Re: A Place For External BVS Sites?
item.content:encoded: There is not currently a place for it, but I'm not opposed to it. We do have a page specifically for the IRC channel, and we could definitely add one for the news reports. (The reports are probably big enough warrant their own page). But, we should probably add a "other resources" page.

item.title: Re: A Place For External BVS Sites?
item.content:encoded: umm i understood none of that lol

item.title: A Place For External BVS Sites?
item.content:encoded: Is there a proper place to put BvS Related websites that aren't run or maintained by the creator? I was looking to add in BVS Channel 5 News which, much to my surprise, has become pretty darn popular. It is very much BvS Related and seemed appropriate on here but I wasn't sure if there was a designated section for setting that up.
